positive.title: In Atlantic City, Strong Opinions on Donald Trump Before N.J. Primary
positive.subtext: Even though Donald Trump has left Atlantic City, his name still adorns the Trump Taj Mahal and has the power to provoke strong reactions from residents and visitors.

neutral.title: Trumps 3500 lawsuits unprecedented for a presidential nominee
neutral.subtext: Our project found about 3,500 legal actions involving Trump, including 1,900 where he or his companies were a plaintiff and about 1,300 in which he was the defendant

negative.title: Donald Trump and Chris Christie, the Twin Villains of Atlantic City
negative.subtext: Residents of the nearly bankrupt boardwalk town gripe about the moguls failed casinos and the governor’s power play.

positive.title: England fans threatened with Euro 2016 bloodbath in France's 'Kalashnikov capital
positive.subtext: ENGLAND fans were warned they would be the target of knife-wielding drug taking thugs in Europe’s capital of crime – Marseille – long before last night's brawl.

neutral.title: Euro 2016: Dozens injured as crowds of rival fans brawl
neutral.subtext: Packs of Russian and English football fans clashed in the French city of Marseille in a third straight day of battles at the Euro 2016 championship.

negative.title: UK hooligans, locals clash in French city ahead of soccer event
negative.subtext: Riot police in France have used tear gas to halt clashes between British soccer fans and locals in the French port city of Marseilles ahead of a European soccer event.
